```bash
> bin/segwit tx -w test1.key --type np2wpkh --sendto=2N91jFF4cakS2xfCjpErT8HTatou4F7Aq63 --txid=7e9e632b4ef209e3f16e1cfe46de6e502c6fdba7d691b316501c9bae2dc4123f --vout=0 --amount=16200000

```

```bash
>bin/segwit tx -w test2.key --type np2wpkh --sendto=2NEA77nr3nNLfwANf3jW88f4i2BCfVyMXgx --txid=8bc9f3ebd8dc84c4ae809cc8e6da272480f5d3ab20a1db634daa7efe1abb776f --vout=0 --amount=16200000

```

```bash
> bin/segwit tx -w test1.key --type p2pkh --sendto=mypo7ZKXCjRSDHp7jLZwFkQzEqK2oci2Wm --txid=25a04303b0047674461b845197f2ef5504b0158cce2a7085a3a213874b9914b5 --vout=0 --amount=16150000

```

```bash
> bin/segwit tx -w test1.key --type raw --sendto=mypo7ZKXCjRSDHp7jLZwFkQzEqK2oci2Wm --txid=25a04303b0047674461b845197f2ef5504b0158cce2a7085a3a213874b9914b5 --vout=0 --amount=16150000

```
